name: Closers: Essential Starter Pack
detailed_description:
The Closers: Essential Starter Pack is just what you need to kick off your quest to protect our dimension from monstrous alien invaders! The pack contains:

  • Luck Stabilizer ×45— Grants you a 30% found item bonus!
  • 30-Day Elite Status Voucher—Get the most out of Closers with a month of elite status!
  • White Fox Accessory Set Box—Contains the Snow Fox Tail, Ears, and Anklet 1-star costume pieces!
  • +11 Gear Booster ×2—Enhance your key gear to +11 in one go!
  • +12 Gear Booster—And this one goes to +12!
  • Resurrection Capsule ×100—If you fall down, get back up again!
  • 7-Day Maid Service Voucher—Improve your explorations for 7 days!
  • 7-Day Gardening Voucher—Increase the number of times you can plant seeds…and get a free Rainbow Seed each day!
